collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (7 total Queries, 7 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN (@@OPTIONS | 256) = @@OPTIONS THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS qi
select USERNAME as usernamelgn,EMAIL as emaillgn,NAME as namalgn,ISSUPERUSER as issuperuserlgn from webot_USERAUTH where username='ADMIN                                             ' and inactive=0

select * from webot_MAILBOX where IS_READ=0 and IS_ARCHIVED=0 and IS_TRASHED=0 and IS_DELETED=0 and TO_USER='ADMIN                                             ' order by SENDING_DATE desc, MAILSEQ desc

select a.IDNAVL1 as breadcrumb_idnavh,a.NAVL1NAME as breadcrumb_navh,b.NAVDL1NAME as breadcrumb_navd,b.NAVLINK from webot_NAVIGATIONH a inner join webot_NAVIGATIONDL1 b on b.IDNAVL1=a.IDNAVL1 where b.NAVLINK='requisition' and a.inactive=0

select a.IDNAVL1 as mhid,a.NAVL1NAME as mhname,a.ICONDESC as mhicon, b.NAVDL1NAME as mdname,b.NAVLINK as mdcontroller,b.fa_icon as mdicon from webot_USERGROUPROLE x left join webot_NAVIGATIONDL1 b on b.IDNAVDL1=x.IDNAVDL1 and b.IDNAVL1=x.IDNAVL1 left join webot_NAVIGATIONH a on a.IDNAVL1=b.IDNAVL1 left join (select USERNAME,GROUPID from webot_USERAUTH) y on y.GROUPID=x.GROUPID and y.USERNAME='ADMIN 'where y.USERNAME='ADMIN ' and x.ISACTIVE=1 ORDER BY a.NAVL1SORTING,b.SORTING ASC

SELECT "webot_CSR".*, "b"."RQNDATE", "b"."RQNNUMBER" FROM "ANDRITZ_db"."dbo"."webot_CSR" LEFT JOIN "ANDRITZ_db"."dbo"."webot_REQUISITION" "b" ON "b"."CSRUNIQ" = "webot_CSR"."CSRUNIQ" WHERE "webot_CSR"."POSTINGSTAT" = 1 AND "b"."RQNNUMBER" is NULL ORDER BY "webot_CSR"."CSRUNIQ" DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 2 ROWS ONLY
